filelist.S04n297: Daśabhūmikasūtre gāthāvibhāgaḥ -1 pramuditā nāma prathamā bhūmiḥ

filelist.S04n373: 10. tamondhakāra bhūmi yakṣa rākṣasa paribodhana saddharmāvatāraṇa prakaraṇam
filelist.S04n378: 15. śrījetārāma viśvabhū darśana sukhāvatī pratyudgama prakaraṇam
filelist.S04n380: 17. sarvasattvoddhāraṇa saṁbodhimārga sthāpana maheśvaromādevī saṁbodhi vyākaraṇopadeśa prakaraṇam
filelist.S04n381: 18. sarva sabhāloka saddharma śravaṇotsāha saṁpramodita svasvālaya pratigamana prakaraṇam
